message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth significantly more than its market value to you. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're offering, my budget is a bit tighter. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. This is my best offer, as it aligns with my budget and allows me to acquire the product without overspending. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to negotiate further. My proposal is to offer the product for $11000. This is a significant discount from the original asking price, while still providing a substantial profit for me. I hope this aligns better with your budget and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
